hero.title: ASMI: Your SAP Experts
hero.description: At ASMI, we help businesses get the most out of SAP. From setup to optimization, our experts make your systems smarter, faster, and aligned with your goals, so you can run efficiently today and scale confidently tomorrow.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.paragraph1: At ASMI, we help businesses work smarter with SAP. Our team combines hands-on experience and real-world understanding to build solutions that make operations simpler, faster, and ready for what's next.
whoWeAre.paragraph2: With roots in the Netherlands and India, we support clients worldwide, delivering SAP systems that truly fit their goals. Every project we take on is driven by one thing — helping our clients grow with clarity and confidence.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer SAP solutions built around your business. From setup to support, we make your systems smoother, smarter, and ready to grow with you.

list: "Their SAP expertise transformed our processes, efficient, reliable, and seamless implementation!" – Cargill Corporation

questions.q: How does ASMI ensure a smooth SAP implementation?
questions.a: We follow a structured rollout plan with clear milestones, thorough testing, and close collaboration with your team to avoid downtime and ensure the system works from day one.

questions.q: Can we customize SAP solutions for our unique business needs?
questions.a: Yes, we configure SAP workflows, reports, and dashboards to match your exact operational requirements, so the system fits your business processes perfectly.

questions.q: Can we integrate SAP with our existing systems?
questions.a: Absolutely. We connect SAP with your ERP, CRM, and other software, enabling seamless data flow and unified reporting without disrupting ongoing operations.

questions.q: Does ASMI provide training for our team on SAP systems?
questions.a: Yes, we deliver tailored training sessions, user manuals, and hands-on support to ensure your staff can use SAP confidently and independently.

questions.q: How quickly can we see improvements after implementing SAP with ASMI?
questions.a: Clients typically notice better process efficiency and accurate reporting within the first few weeks, with measurable operational improvements and cost savings visible within 2–3 months.

finalCTA.title: Make your SAP work better with ASMI
finalCTA.description: Get systems that run right and grow with your business.

hero.title: Learn More About ASMI
hero.description: Discover how ASMI helps businesses run better with SAP. We bring hands-on expertise, practical solutions, and a clear focus on results that move your business forward.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: At ASMI, we've built our work around one belief — technology should make business simpler, not harder. From our base in Utrecht, we help companies use SAP in ways that truly matter: smoother operations, smarter decisions, and stronger results. Our team blends deep know-how with real-world insight to create solutions that fit how your business actually runs.
story.paragraph2: We've earned the trust of global names like Hitachi, Cargill, and Deloitte by staying hands-on, honest, and focused on lasting impact. For us, it's never about quick fixes — it's about building systems that stand the test of time and help businesses grow with confidence.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.paragraph1: We aim to shape a future where businesses run with clarity, agility, and purpose through the power of SAP. Our vision is to help organizations move beyond complexity by building intelligent systems that simplify work, strengthen decisions, and enable sustainable growth.
vision.paragraph2: We see technology as a driver of real progress. By combining deep expertise with a partnership mindset, we work to create lasting value — empowering businesses to operate smarter, innovate faster, and stay ahead in a changing world.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: Our mission is to deliver SAP solutions that turn challenges into opportunities and strategies into results. We help businesses optimize performance, streamline operations, and unlock the full potential of their systems through thoughtful, precise implementation.
mission.paragraph2: Every project reflects our commitment to excellence, collaboration, and measurable outcomes. We focus on building reliable solutions that adapt to change, create impact from day one, and support long-term success for every client we work with.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: Our team blends real experience with a shared drive to make SAP work better for you.

basavaraj.name: Basavaraj K M
basavaraj.bio: With 20+ years in SAP consulting, he specializes in S/4HANA Finance, Central Finance, and Group Reporting. He has led multiple global implementations and migrations with proven results. A certified S/4HANA expert, he focuses on delivering practical, high-impact digital transformation solutions.

asha.name: Asha M
asha.bio: As Managing Partner, she leads the firm's strategy and operations. She focuses on delivering measurable results and building strong client relationships. Her leadership combines vision, accountability, and a commitment to excellence.

finalCTA.description: Start your SAP journey with the right partner.

process.title: Application Process
process.description: Join Our Global Team at ASMI Technologies

steps.title: Find a Job
steps.description: Explore current openings on our ASMI Careers Page and find roles that match your skills and interests.

steps.title: Apply
steps.description: Submit your online application and receive instant confirmation.

steps.title: Pre-Selection
steps.description: We review your skills and experience to determine fit and may consider you for other relevant positions.

steps.title: Interview
steps.description: Shortlisted candidates meet the recruiting manager and HR. Additional rounds or assessments may apply. Virtual or in-person interviews available.

steps.title: Selection
steps.description: References may be checked. If selected, you'll receive an offer with a competitive package. All other applicants are notified.

steps.title: Onboarding
steps.description: New hires undergo an introduction program to integrate quickly and start contributing effectively.

apply.title: Apply for {job}
apply.description: Submit your details and we will get in touch if your profile is a good match.

finalCTA.title: Ready to Join the ASMI Team?
finalCTA.description: Join a team where you can grow, learn, and build your career.
